name: Bank details

fields.name: Bank name
fields.semanticDescription: The name of the bank

fields.name: IBAN
fields.semanticDescription: The international bank deposit number, usually called IBAN

fields.name: Account number
fields.semanticDescription: The account number

fields.name: Bank number
fields.semanticDescription: The bank number

fields.name: BIC code
fields.semanticDescription: The bank identifier code, usually called BIC

fields.name: Bank address
fields.semanticDescription: The postal address of the bank

fields.name: Owner name
fields.semanticDescription: The owner's name

fields.name: Owner address
fields.semanticDescription: The owner's address

fields.name: Currency
fields.semanticDescription: The currency of the bank account

semanticDescription: a bank account details, also known as bank account information

name: Driver license

fields.name: License number
fields.semanticDescription: The driver license number

fields.name: Country
fields.semanticDescription: The three letters of the country of the driver license

fields.name: First name
fields.semanticDescription: The first name of the driver license owner

fields.name: Second name
fields.semanticDescription: The second name of the driver license owner

fields.name: Last name
fields.semanticDescription: The last name of the driver license owner

fields.name: Birth date
fields.semanticDescription: The birth date value of the driver license owner

semanticDescription: a driver's license, also known as driving permit and driving licence

name: Id Card

fields.name: Card number
fields.semanticDescription: The id card number

fields.name: Country
fields.semanticDescription: The three letters of the country of the id card

fields.name: First name
fields.semanticDescription: The first name of the id card owner

fields.name: Second name
fields.semanticDescription: The second name of the id card owner

fields.name: Last name
fields.semanticDescription: The last name of the id card owner

fields.name: Birth date
fields.semanticDescription: The birth date of the id card owner

semanticDescription: an identity card, also known as a personal identification card

name: Invoice

fields.name: Invoice number
fields.semanticDescription: The invoice number if it exists, otherwise ignore this field.

fields.name: Date emission
fields.semanticDescription: The date of the invoice

fields.name: Due date
fields.semanticDescription: The due date of the payment if it exists, otherwise ignore this field.

fields.name: Customer name
fields.semanticDescription: The customer's name mentioned on the invoice

fields.name: Customer address
fields.semanticDescription: The customer's address mentioned on the invoice

fields.name: Vendor name
fields.semanticDescription: The vendor's name mentioned on the invoice

fields.name: Vendor address
fields.semanticDescription: The vendor's address mentioned on the invoice

fields.name: Total amount, VAT excluded
fields.semanticDescription: The total amount of the invoice, excluding taxes

fields.name: Total amount, VAT included
fields.semanticDescription: The total amount of the invoice, including taxes

fields.name: VAT percentage
fields.semanticDescription: The VAT percentage applied

fields.name: VAT amount
fields.semanticDescription: The VAT amount to be paid

fields.name: Currency
fields.semanticDescription: Currency used in this invoice

fields.name: Line items
fields.semanticDescription: The line items (if any) of the invoice in JSON format including the header for each value.

fields.name: Point of contact
fields.semanticDescription: The point of contact (POC) of the invoice, referring to the name, email and/or phone number of the individual or department that serves as the main liaison between the invoice issuer and the recipient organization, if it exists, otherwise ignore this field.

fields.name: Payment terms
fields.semanticDescription: The payment terms in the invoice, referring to the conditions under which a buyer is required to make payment to a seller for goods or services, if it exists, otherwise ignore this field.

semanticDescription: an invoice, also known as a bill or sales invoice

fields.name: Passport number
fields.semanticDescription: The passport number

fields.name: Country
fields.semanticDescription: The country mentioned of the passport

fields.name: First name
fields.semanticDescription: The first name of passport owner

fields.name: Second name
fields.semanticDescription: The second name of passport owner

fields.name: Last name
fields.semanticDescription: The last name of passport owner

fields.name: Birth date
fields.semanticDescription: The birth date of the passport owner

name: Payment card

fields.name: Card number
fields.semanticDescription: The payment card number

fields.name: Expiration date
fields.semanticDescription: The expiration date of the payment card

fields.name: CVV
fields.semanticDescription: The card verification code or card verification value

fields.name: Owner name
fields.semanticDescription: The name of the owner of the card

semanticDescription: a credit card, also known as a transaction card and bank card

name: Payroll statement

fields.name: Employee first name
fields.semanticDescription: The first name of the employee

fields.name: Employee last name
fields.semanticDescription: The last name of the employee

fields.name: Employee SSN
fields.semanticDescription: The employee's social security number

fields.name: Net salary
fields.semanticDescription: The amount of net salary

fields.name: Gross salary
fields.semanticDescription: The amount of gross salary

fields.name: Pay date
fields.semanticDescription: The date of wage payment

fields.name: Period beginning
fields.semanticDescription: Pay stub start date

fields.name: Period ending
fields.semanticDescription: Pay stub end date

semanticDescription: a payroll statement, also known as pay stub and pay slip

name: Purchase order

fields.name: PO number
fields.semanticDescription: The number of the purchase order

fields.name: Date emission
fields.semanticDescription: The date of the purchase order

fields.name: Buyer name
fields.semanticDescription: The buyer's name mentioned on the purchase order

fields.name: Buyer address
fields.semanticDescription: The buyer's address mentioned on the purchase order

fields.name: Vendor name
fields.semanticDescription: The vendor's name mentioned on the purchase order

fields.name: Vendor address
fields.semanticDescription: The vendor's address mentioned on the purchase order

fields.name: Total VAT excluded
fields.semanticDescription: The total price without taxes of the purchase order

fields.name: Total VAT included
fields.semanticDescription: The total price with taxes included of the purchase order

fields.name: VAT percentage
fields.semanticDescription: The VAT percentage applied

fields.name: VAT amount
fields.semanticDescription: The VAT amount to be paid

fields.name: Currency
fields.semanticDescription: Currency used in this invoice

semanticDescription: a purchase order, also known as a procurement order

name: Receipt

fields.name: Receipt number
fields.semanticDescription: The receipt number

fields.name: VAT percentage
fields.semanticDescription: The VAT percentage applied

fields.name: VAT amount
fields.semanticDescription: The VAT amount to be paid

fields.name: Total VAT excluded
fields.semanticDescription: The total price without taxes of receipt

fields.name: Total VAT included
fields.semanticDescription: The total price with taxes included of the receipt

fields.name: Purchase date
fields.semanticDescription: The purchase date

fields.name: Supplier name
fields.semanticDescription: The  name of the supplier

fields.name: Country
fields.semanticDescription: The country

fields.name: Currency
fields.semanticDescription: The currency of the receipt

fields.name: VAT number
fields.semanticDescription: The vat number of the supplier

semanticDescription: a receipt, also known as an order acknowledgment and sales receipt

name: Resume

fields.name: First name
fields.semanticDescription: The first name of the person mentioned on the resume

fields.name: Last name
fields.semanticDescription: The last name of the person mentioned on the resume

fields.name: Email
fields.semanticDescription: The email of the person mentioned on the resume

fields.name: Phone number
fields.semanticDescription: The phone number of the person mentioned on the resume

fields.name: Birth date
fields.semanticDescription: The birth date of the person mentioned on the resume

fields.name: Age
fields.semanticDescription: The age of the person mentioned on the resume

fields.name: Years of experience
fields.semanticDescription: The total number of years of work of the person mentioned on the resume

fields.name: Technologies
fields.semanticDescription: The technologies used on previous experiences of the person mentioned on the resume

fields.name: Languages
fields.semanticDescription: The languages the person mentioned on the resume can talk with the level of each of them

semanticDescription: a resume, also known as a curriculum vitae
